metadata.title: CVE-2023-45733 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Hardware logic contains race conditions in some Intel(R) Processors mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable partial informationdisclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240514.0ubuntu0.18.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240514.0ubuntu0.18.04.1+esm1').
